yes i love real avi hd and it gets a bad rap for some reason but its better then mkv or even mp4 hd funny thing is that most the avi you will find on here is shit because its transcoded in sd resolution e.g you can have a fantastic looking 700mb movie transcoded at 1080p then one thats transcoded at 480p and its just the screen resolution .... avi still is the best. the only problem is noobs downloading a miss labeld torrents and then saying all hd avi sucks so other people wont download noob: oh i checked to see what the files said there avi D: dont download..... ummm did you watch the fucking video??? no then dont give a fucking torrent a bad name unless you have checked it completely
